title.rendered: Luxurious 4BHK Apartment For Sale In Shanti Niketan

content.rendered:
Royale Realtors is extremely proud to introduce to the market, this splendid four-bedroom Ultra Modern, High End, Super Luxury apartment in Shanti Niketan, which is a prominent Diplomatic housing locality in close proximity to other high-end areas like Westend, Anand Niketan, and Chanakyapuri. This attractive, spacious, and skilfully crafted home is under Booking by a Reputed Builder and comprises; 4 Large Bedrooms with attached bathrooms, Stilt Parking for 2 cars, a modern-looking futuristic elevation, and a welcoming entrance. On this luxury floor, there is an imported modular kitchen with A+ specifications, a large living & dining room & a family lounge with top-notch interiors, and a powder room. This hugely versatile space offers the ideal setting for entertainment, comfort, and easy living. Natural light floods through this luxury apartment via big windows. This apartment offers a separate driveway, an Exclusive gate, and servant quarters.
♕400sqyds
♕2150sqft
♕Middle Floor
♕2 Cars Stilt Parking
♕4 Bedrooms with Attached Bathrooms
♕Spacious Living/Dining Area
♕Family Lounge
♕Powder Room
♕Imported Modular Kitchen
♕A+ Specifications
♕Luxurious Designer Apartment
♕Excellent Location
♕Separate Driveway
♕Exclusive Gate
♕2 Car Parking Space
♕Servant Quarter
♕Reputed Builder
📞 Call On 9818312077 For Site Visit
Visit the website: https://www.royalerealtorsindia.com
wa.me/919818312077
Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
